sentences.sContent: Two or three fishing boats were moored alongside the pier.
sentences.sCn: 有两三艘渔船停泊在码头边。

sentences.sContent: Colliford is higher, right up on the moors.
sentences.sCn: 考里弗德更高，正好在荒野之上。

remMethod.val: 月光(moon)下， 那个可怜的(poor)老人走在旷野(moor)中

trans.tranOther: to fasten a ship or boat to the land or to the bottom of the sea using ropes or an  anchor
A moor is an area of open and usually high land with poor soil that is covered mainly with grass and heather
